sentences.sContent: Her lifestyle was remarkably free from ostentation.
sentences.sCn: 她的生活方式毫不张扬。

remMethod.val: os(在前面) + tent(伸展) + ation → 在他人面前伸展 → 显现出来 → 夸示， 炫耀

words.tran: 招摇的；卖弄的；夸耀的；铺张的；惹人注目的

trans.tranCn: 卖弄, 夸耀, 摆阔, 风头主义
trans.tranOther: when you deliberately try to show people how rich or clever you are, in order to make them admire you
